trends: There have been 2 other sightings in La Grange Park
There were no other sightings in La Grange Park on or around September 23rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside for a cigarette looked to my right up by the trees and saw 5 very very bright red orange glowing objects in the sky traveling sw to se. watched for a few seconds. Stuck my head in the door and said "get out here quick" to my wife she watched for a few seconds and then told our son to get her her phone to take video of them. All three of us watched and videoed the objects travel from sw to se with other objects such as planes clearly identifiable closer. They were bright red orange with 4 flying in formation (square)the rest trailing. They were far away, much further than the planes that could be spotted. Some of the objects disappeared behind the trees and others simply went out. Son wondered what the heck are those things, wife said it must be a tribute memorial for something must be going on, me I said ufos. event lasted for 20 - 25 min.
Summary: {nd} 5 orange red fireball (very bright) type objects traveling sw to se in formation followed by 3 more objects going in the same direction. Have video of the event
